description.value: You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself. Whenever you critically hit using a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Composite Shortbow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Glaive], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Longspear], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Longsword], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Shortbow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Spear], or a conrasu weapon(@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Buugeng]), you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
